input: Consider the following statements and select the correct answer from the codes given below : Assertion (Q) : The rule-making power of the Supreme Court is not subject to any law made by the Parliament of India. Reason (R) : Only an impartial and independent judiciary can protect the rights of the individual without fear or favour. Codes :

options.A: Both Q and R are individually true and R is the correct explanation of Q
options.B: Both Q and R are individually true but R is not the correct explanation of Q
options.C: Q is true but R is false
options.D: Q is false but R is true
